meanings.definition: A square board divided into 64 squares of alternating colors, used for playing chess.
meanings.sent1: The chessboard had black and white squares for the game.
meanings.sent2: The players set up their pieces on the chessboard before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: When the cat walked across the chessboard, it looked like a giant game of hopscotch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a chessboard, carefully strategizing each move in life.
meanings.sent5: The chessboard's checkered pattern made it easy to distinguish each square.

meanings.definition: The pattern or design of a chessboard.
meanings.sent1: The intricate chessboard design was mesmerizing to look at.
meanings.sent2: The chessboard's unique pattern made it stand out among other board games.
meanings.sent3: She thought the chessboard's design resembled a maze for tiny mice.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, the city streets formed a complex chessboard of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The chessboard's design was so detailed, it seemed to tell a story in each square.
